00023 /* Encode-Decode escape sequences into a buffer, the following are recognized:
00024  * ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00025  * \0  NUL
00026  * \b  BS  backspace          (\010  8  8)
00027  * \t  HT  horizontal tab     (\011  9  9)
00028  * \n  LF  newline            (\012 10  A)
00029  * \v  VT  vertical tab       (\013 11  B)
00030  * \f  FF  formfeed           (\014 12  C)
00031  * \r  CR  carriage return    (\015 13  D)
00032  * \e  ESC character          (\033 27 1B)
00033  *
00034  * \^C   C = any letter (Control code)
00035  * \xDD  number formed of 1-2 hex   digits
00036  * \DDD  number formed of 1-3 octal digits
00037  * ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00038  */
00039 
00040 extern U_EXPORT uint32_t u_sprintc(char* buffer, unsigned char c);
00041 
00042 extern U_EXPORT uint32_t u_escape_encode(const unsigned char* s, uint32_t n,                      char* result, uint32_t max_length);
00043 extern U_EXPORT uint32_t u_escape_decode(const                    char* s, uint32_t n, unsigned char* result);
00044 
00045 #ifdef __cplusplus
00046 }
00047 #endif
00048 
00049 #endif
